mapper.select: SELECT Max(attitude_date) FROM SERVICE_ATTITUDE GROUP BY employee_id HAVING employee_id = #{employee_id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SERVICE_ATTITUDE WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employee WHERE employee_id like '%'||NVL(#{search},employee_id)||'%' UNION SELECT employee_id FROM employee WHERE employee_name like '%'||NVL(#{search},employee_name)||'%' )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT employee_id,employee_name,attitude_date, hr_code_group_leave,leave_code,attitude_period, hr_code_group_reason,attitude_reason,rownum rNum FROM (SELECT SA.employee_id,E.employee_name,SA.attitude_date, SA.hr_code_group_leave,SA.leave_code,SA.attitude_period, SA.hr_code_group_reason,SA.attitude_reason FROM SERVICE_ATTITUDE SA , employee E WHERE SA.employee_id = E.employee_id AND E.employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employee WHERE employee_id like '%'||NVL(#{search},employee_id)||'%' UNION SELECT employee_id FROM employee WHERE employee_name like '%'||NVL(#{search},employee_name)||'%' ) ORDER BY E.employee_name, SA.attitude_date DESC ) ) WHERE rNum >= #{start} AND rNum <= #{end}

SELECT SA.employee_id,E.employee_name,SA.attitude_date, SA.hr_code_group_leave,SA.leave_code,SA.attitude_period, SA.hr_code_group_reason,SA.attitude_reason FROM SERVICE_ATTITUDE SA , employee E WHERE SA.employee_id = E.employee_id AND E.employee_id = (SELECT employee_id FROM employee WHERE employee_id = #{employee_id} ) ORDER BY E.employee_name, SA.attitude_date DESC
